H0.text: Number of phosphates is responsible for determining the traits of an organism.

H1.text: The amount of thymine is responsible for determining the traits of an organism.

H2.text: Sequence of nucleotides is responsible for determining the traits of an organism.

H3.text: The type of bond between bases is responsible for determining the traits of an organism.

A4.text: Within a gene, the sequence of bases along a DNA strand defines a messenger RNA sequence, which then defines one or more protein sequences.
